title: Front-end Animation Showcase
description: Explore the fascinating world of front-end development in this React project. Immerse yourself in captivating animations powered by the Framer Motion library and witness dynamic data visualizations with the mighty Three.js. This project also features seamless API integration, fetching data in real-time for an enriching user experience.

title: Movie Explorer with Node.js
description: Embark on a cinematic journey with this JavaScript, HTML, and CSS project, powered by Node.js. Users can log in, seamlessly search for movies through various filters, and curate their own personalized favorite list. Dive deep into detailed movie information, making this project a comprehensive and enjoyable movie exploration experience.

title: 3D Model Viewer
description: Explore the fascinating world of 3D models in this React project. The application features a dynamic 3D model viewer where users can upload and interact with 3D models (GLBfile). The upload mechanism, coded with React, enhances the user experience, allowing seamless exploration of various 3D models.

title: Real-Time Chat Tool with Socket.io
description: ChatTool is a simple real-time chat application that allows users to join chat rooms and communicate with each other instantly. Built with Socket.io for real-time communication and React for the frontend, this project offers a seamless and responsive chat experience. Users can create unique usernames, join chat rooms, send and receive messages in real-time, and see a list of users currently present in the chat room.

title: RSC Anderlecht Club App (iOS - Swift UI)
description: Immerse yourself in the world of RSC Anderlecht with this iOS app coded using Swift UI. Created as a part of the iOS development course during my second year, this app serves as a dedicated platform for fans of RSC Anderlecht. Explore features such as viewing the team roster, staying updated with the latest news through a dedicated newspaper section, and keeping track of match scores. Developed using Xcode, the app provides an intuitive and immersive experience for fans to stay connected with their favorite football club.

title: Real-Time Video Chat App with WebRTC and Peer.js (React)
description: Dive into the world of real-time communication with this React app powered by WebRTC and Peer.js. Experience seamless video chat functionality, allowing users to connect with each other instantly. Built as part of an exploration into WebRTC technology, this app provides a platform for users to initiate peer-to-peer video calls. The integration of React enhances the user interface, offering an intuitive and responsive experience. Explore the possibilities of real-time video communication with this innovative project.
